SciTE menu commands

scite.MenuCommand(IDM_constant)
- equivalent to the corresponding IDM_ command defined in SciTE.h

IDM_constantSymbolic NameMenu text
101IDM_NEWNew
102IDM_OPENOpen
103IDM_OPENSELECTEDOpen Selected Filename

105IDM_CLOSEClose
106IDM_SAVESave

Scintilla key commands

scite.SendEditor(SCI_constant, ...)
- sends a message to the editor pane
- equivalent to the corresponding iface function or property

scite.SendOutput(SCI_constant, ...)
- sends a message to the output pane

SCI_constantNameExplanation
2547SCI_ANNOTATIONCLEARALLClear the annotations from all lines
2101SCI_AUTOCCANCELRemove the auto-completion list from the screen.
2104SCI_AUTOCCOMPLETEUser has selected an item so remove the list and insert the selection.
2328SCI_BACKTABDedent the selected lines.
2078SCI_BEGINUNDOACTIONStart a sequence of actions that is undone and redone as a unit. May be nested.
2201SCI_CALLTIPCANCELRemove the call tip from the screen.
2325SCI_CANCELCancel any modes such as call tip or auto-completion list display.
2304SCI_CHARLEFTMove caret left one character.
2305SCI_CHARLEFTEXTENDMove caret left one character extending selection to new caret position.
2428SCI_CHARLEFTRECTEXTENDMove caret left one character, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2306SCI_CHARRIGHTMove caret right one character.
2307SCI_CHARRIGHTEXTENDMove caret right one character extending selection to new caret position.
2429SCI_CHARRIGHTRECTEXTENDMove caret right one character, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2399SCI_CHOOSECARETXSet the last x chosen value to be the caret x position.
2180SCI_CLEARClear the selection.
2004SCI_CLEARALLDelete all text in the document.
2072SCI_CLEARALLCMDKEYSDrop all key mappings.
2005SCI_CLEARDOCUMENTSTYLESet all style bytes to 0, remove all folding information.
2408SCI_CLEARREGISTEREDIMAGESClear all the registered XPM images.
2571SCI_CLEARSELECTIONSClear selections to a single empty stream selection
2178SCI_COPYCopy the selection to the clipboard.
2519SCI_COPYALLOWLINECopy the selection, if selection empty copy the line with the caret
2177SCI_CUTCut the selection to the clipboard.
2395SCI_DELLINELEFTDelete back from the current position to the start of the line.
2396SCI_DELLINERIGHTDelete forwards from the current position to the end of the line.
2335SCI_DELWORDLEFTDelete the word to the left of the caret.
2336SCI_DELWORDRIGHTDelete the word to the right of the caret.
2518SCI_DELWORDRIGHTENDDelete the word to the right of the caret, but not the trailing non-word characters.
2326SCI_DELETEBACKDelete the selection or if no selection, the character before the caret.
2344SCI_DELETEBACKNOTLINEDelete the selection or if no selection, the character before the caret. Will not delete the character before at the start of a line.
2318SCI_DOCUMENTENDMove caret to last position in document.
2319SCI_DOCUMENTENDEXTENDMove caret to last position in document extending selection to new caret position.
2316SCI_DOCUMENTSTARTMove caret to first position in document.
2317SCI_DOCUMENTSTARTEXTENDMove caret to first position in document extending selection to new caret position.
2324SCI_EDITTOGGLEOVERTYPESwitch from insert to overtype mode or the reverse.
2175SCI_EMPTYUNDOBUFFERDelete the undo history.
2079SCI_ENDUNDOACTIONEnd a sequence of actions that is undone and redone as a unit.
2642SCI_FINDINDICATORHIDEOn OS X, hide the find indicator.
2330SCI_FORMFEEDInsert a Form Feed character.
4023SCI_FREESUBSTYLESFree allocated sub styles
2400SCI_GRABFOCUSSet the focus to this Scintilla widget.
2312SCI_HOMEMove caret to first position on line.
2345SCI_HOMEDISPLAYMove caret to first position on display line.
2346SCI_HOMEDISPLAYEXTENDMove caret to first position on display line extending selection to new caret position.
2313SCI_HOMEEXTENDMove caret to first position on line extending selection to new caret position.
2430SCI_HOMERECTEXTENDMove caret to first position on line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2349SCI_HOMEWRAPLike Home but when word-wrap is enabled goes first to start of display line HomeDisplay, then to start of document line Home.
2450SCI_HOMEWRAPEXTENDLike HomeExtend but when word-wrap is enabled extends first to start of display line HomeDisplayExtend, then to start of document line HomeExtend.
2455SCI_LINECOPYCopy the line containing the caret.
2337SCI_LINECUTCut the line containing the caret.
2338SCI_LINEDELETEDelete the line containing the caret.
2300SCI_LINEDOWNMove caret down one line.
2301SCI_LINEDOWNEXTENDMove caret down one line extending selection to new caret position.
2426SCI_LINEDOWNRECTEXTENDMove caret down one line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2404SCI_LINEDUPLICATEDuplicate the current line.
2314SCI_LINEENDMove caret to last position on line.
2347SCI_LINEENDDISPLAYMove caret to last position on display line.
2348SCI_LINEENDDISPLAYEXTENDMove caret to last position on display line extending selection to new caret position.
2315SCI_LINEENDEXTENDMove caret to last position on line extending selection to new caret position.
2432SCI_LINEENDRECTEXTENDMove caret to last position on line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2451SCI_LINEENDWRAPLike LineEnd but when word-wrap is enabled goes first to end of display line LineEndDisplay, then to start of document line LineEnd.
2452SCI_LINEENDWRAPEXTENDLike LineEndExtend but when word-wrap is enabled extends first to end of display line LineEndDisplayExtend, then to start of document line LineEndExtend.
2342SCI_LINESCROLLDOWNScroll the document down, keeping the caret visible.
2343SCI_LINESCROLLUPScroll the document up, keeping the caret visible.
2339SCI_LINETRANSPOSESwitch the current line with the previous.
2302SCI_LINEUPMove caret up one line.
2303SCI_LINEUPEXTENDMove caret up one line extending selection to new caret position.
2427SCI_LINEUPRECTEXTENDMove caret up one line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2288SCI_LINESJOINJoin the lines in the target.
2340SCI_LOWERCASETransform the selection to lower case.
2536SCI_MARGINTEXTCLEARALLClear the margin text on all lines
2401SCI_MOVECARETINSIDEVIEWMove the caret inside current view if it's not there already.
2621SCI_MOVESELECTEDLINESDOWNMove the selected lines down one line, shifting the line below before the selection
2620SCI_MOVESELECTEDLINESUPMove the selected lines up one line, shifting the line above after the selection
2695SCI_MULTIEDGECLEARALLClear all vertical edges.
2689SCI_MULTIPLESELECTADDEACHAdd each occurrence of the main selection in the target to the set of selections. If the current selection is empty then select word around caret.
2688SCI_MULTIPLESELECTADDNEXTAdd the next occurrence of the main selection to the set of selections as main. If the current selection is empty then select word around caret.
2329SCI_NEWLINEInsert a new line, may use a CRLF, CR or LF depending on EOL mode.
2172SCI_NULLNull operation.
2322SCI_PAGEDOWNMove caret one page down.
2323SCI_PAGEDOWNEXTENDMove caret one page down extending selection to new caret position.
2434SCI_PAGEDOWNRECTEXTENDMove caret one page down, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2320SCI_PAGEUPMove caret one page up.
2321SCI_PAGEUPEXTENDMove caret one page up extending selection to new caret position.
2433SCI_PAGEUPRECTEXTENDMove caret one page up, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.
2413SCI_PARADOWNMove caret down one paragraph (delimited by empty lines).
2414SCI_PARADOWNEXTENDExtend selection down one paragraph (delimited by empty lines).
2415SCI_PARAUPMove caret up one paragraph (delimited by empty lines).
2416SCI_PARAUPEXTENDExtend selection up one paragraph (delimited by empty lines).
2179SCI_PASTEPaste the contents of the clipboard into the document replacing the selection.
2011SCI_REDORedoes the next action on the undo history.
2552SCI_RELEASEALLEXTENDEDSTYLESRelease all extended (>255) style numbers
2606SCI_ROTATESELECTIONSet the main selection to the next selection.
2169SCI_SCROLLCARETEnsure the caret is visible.
2629SCI_SCROLLTOENDScroll to end of document.
2628SCI_SCROLLTOSTARTScroll to start of document.
2366SCI_SEARCHANCHORSets the current caret position to be the search anchor.
2013SCI_SELECTALLSelect all the text in the document.
2469SCI_SELECTIONDUPLICATEDuplicate the selection. If selection empty duplicate the line containing the caret.
2444SCI_SETCHARSDEFAULTReset the set of characters for whitespace and word characters to the defaults.
2014SCI_SETSAVEPOINTRemember the current position in the undo history as the position at which the document was saved.
3001SCI_STARTRECORDStart notifying the container of all key presses and commands.
3002SCI_STOPRECORDStop notifying the container of all key presses and commands.
2437SCI_STUTTEREDPAGEDOWNMove caret to bottom of page, or one page down if already at bottom of page.
2438SCI_STUTTEREDPAGEDOWNEXTENDMove caret to bottom of page, or one page down if already at bottom of page, extending selection to new caret position.
2435SCI_STUTTEREDPAGEUPMove caret to top of page, or one page up if already at top of page.
2436SCI_STUTTEREDPAGEUPEXTENDMove caret to top of page, or one page up if already at top of page, extending selection to new caret position.
2050SCI_STYLECLEARALLClear all the styles and make equivalent to the global default style.
2058SCI_STYLERESETDEFAULTReset the default style to its state at startup
2607SCI_SWAPMAINANCHORCARETSwap that caret and anchor of the main selection.
2327SCI_TABIf selection is empty or all on one line replace the selection with a tab character. If more than one line selected, indent the lines.
2287SCI_TARGETFROMSELECTIONMake the target range start and end be the same as the selection range start and end.
2690SCI_TARGETWHOLEDOCUMENTSets the target to the whole document.
2459SCI_TOGGLECARETSTICKYSwitch between sticky and non-sticky: meant to be bound to a key.
2176SCI_UNDOUndo one action in the undo history.
2341SCI_UPPERCASETransform the selection to upper case.
2331SCI_VCHOMEMove caret to before first visible character on line. If already there move to first character on line.
2652SCI_VCHOMEDISPLAYMove caret to before first visible character on display line. If already there move to first character on display line.
2653SCI_VCHOMEDISPLAYEXTENDLike VCHomeDisplay but extending selection to new caret position.
2332SCI_VCHOMEEXTENDLike VCHome but extending selection to new caret position.
2431SCI_VCHOMERECTEXTENDMove caret to before first visible character on line. If already there move to first character on line. In either case, extend rectangular selection to new caret position.
2453SCI_VCHOMEWRAPLike VCHome but when word-wrap is enabled goes first to start of display line VCHomeDisplay, then behaves like VCHome.
2454SCI_VCHOMEWRAPEXTENDLike VCHomeExtend but when word-wrap is enabled extends first to start of display line VCHomeDisplayExtend, then behaves like VCHomeExtend.
2619SCI_VERTICALCENTRECARETCentre current line in window.
2308SCI_WORDLEFTMove caret left one word.
2439SCI_WORDLEFTENDMove caret left one word, position cursor at end of word.
2440SCI_WORDLEFTENDEXTENDMove caret left one word, position cursor at end of word, extending selection to new caret position.
2309SCI_WORDLEFTEXTENDMove caret left one word extending selection to new caret position.
2390SCI_WORDPARTLEFTMove to the previous change in capitalisation.
2391SCI_WORDPARTLEFTEXTENDMove to the previous change in capitalisation extending selection to new caret position.
2392SCI_WORDPARTRIGHTMove to the change next in capitalisation.
2393SCI_WORDPARTRIGHTEXTENDMove to the next change in capitalisation extending selection to new caret position.
2310SCI_WORDRIGHTMove caret right one word.
2441SCI_WORDRIGHTENDMove caret right one word, position cursor at end of word.
2442SCI_WORDRIGHTENDEXTENDMove caret right one word, position cursor at end of word, extending selection to new caret position.
2311SCI_WORDRIGHTEXTENDMove caret right one word extending selection to new caret position.
2333SCI_ZOOMINMagnify the displayed text by increasing the sizes by 1 point.
2334SCI_ZOOMOUTMake the displayed text smaller by decreasing the sizes by 1 point.
